title: Did John McCain’s Vote Stop the ACA Repeal for the 2017 Fiscal Year?
subtitle: A theory spread online overstated the consequences of the Arizona senator's July 2017 vote to repeal the Affordable Care Act.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Sen. John McCain's vote against a "skinny repeal' health care proposal stopped attempts to repeal the Affordable Care Act for FY `17.
